hadith.text: Hammad bin Zayd narrated from Ayub, from Nafi', from Ibn 'Umar – Hammad said - :“And it is Marfu` in our view.” (He said): “The Day when all mankind will stand before the Lord of all that exists. They will be standing in their sweat up to the middle of their ears.” (Sahih) [Abu 'Eisa said:] This Hadith is Hasan Sahih. (Another chain) from the Prophet SAW with similar meaning
